answers.answer: I cant think of anything off the top of my head dear, but Im sure they have a list of things to eat for women who becme diabetic during pregnancy on the internet.
Actually m 4m india where most of eatables nt for diabetic

I have gestational diabetes an its not all that bad I can still eat most things I use to but have to cut back a lot an can't have any fried foods or the obvious sugar foods which is what I crave this pregnancy..its tough in the beginning to get use to the diet but you will get the hang of it just watch the amount of carbs you are in taking!!! I usually will eat an apple with peanut butter for snack or a yogurt :-)

I saw a dietician and she gave me a food plan to follow which has so far kept me from getting gestational diabeties. I am borderline but im doing good and it was hard at first but then my body got used to the changes in food. Rather the gaining weight I have losed 23 lbs and im 29 wks tomorrow. I like to eat whole wheat bread with peanutbutter. my problem is the fasting morning sugar but as long as I eat protein before bed I am able to control it. Talk to a dietician cause that's what helped me. Hope this helps
I hope m trying to control my cravingsthanktr:).Its gonna be tough bt my hubby is so caring as well as strict with my healthmay be i need his observation on me
